attributes.action: Teach Parents the Team Teach Techniques that Teachers are taught for parents with children on the Autistic Spectrum
attributes.additional_details:
This is for parents who have a child on the Autistic Spectrum I.e ADHD/ADD, ODD, AUTISM, where are children have to be held in a team teach restraint parents are not taught these restraints but as parents we feel we should be taught these restraints as our children are violent at home as well and if we harm are child unintentionly from holding our child in a fit of rage we can be in trouble.

If we were to be taught these restraints it would put alot more families at ease about having to hold their child
